name: Bazaarify
tag_list: business-reviews, business-reputation, testimonials, appointments, smb-marketing, reviews, reputation, business
overview:
Bazaarify is an innovative software service that enables businesses to amplify their good reputation. Think of Bazaarify as “Yelp-on-steroids” but designed to help businesses.

Here’s how Bazaarify benefits businesses:

• Collects all customers reviews in one place - Bazaarify aggregates the business’s existing reviews from top websites, and it generates new reviews via automated email surveys. This way, the business is aware of what customers are saying.

• Gives the business control of its reputation - Bazaarify allows the business to approve, respond to, or hold customer reviews so that it can proactively engage existing clients and resolve customer concerns in real time.

• Amplifies the business’s good reputation - Bazaarify auto-uploads approved reviews to the business’s website, Facebook page and social media sites. This generates customer referrals and increases the business’s visibility on search engines.

The Bazaarify platform also gives a business: • A one-click professional website (bazaarisite) to showcase its best reviews • Automated appointment reminders, resulting in fewer customer no-shows
